name: MDLMaterialTextureWrapMode
desc: Modes for sampling textures at coordinates outside the texture bounds, used by the sWrapMode, tWrapMode, and rWrapMode properties.

items.name: case clamp
items.desc: Sampling at any texture coordinate outside the 0.0 to 1.0 range returns the texel color from the nearest edge.

items.name: case `repeat`
items.desc: Sampling at texture coordinates outside the 0.0 to 1.0 range results in a repeated tiling effect.

items.name: case mirror
items.desc: Sampling at texture coordinates outside the 0.0 to 1.0 range results in a mirrored tiling effect.
